price: Ба ростӣ, барои парҳезкорон назди Парвардигорашон боғҳои пурнеъмат аст
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
